item.title: Hello
item.description: 你好啊 我在测试 为什么不显示作者 hugo new site myblog 598 ls 599 cd myblog/ 600 ls 601 ls 602 cd themes/ 603 l 604 ls 605 git clone htpps://github.com/vaga/hugo-theme-m10c.git 606 git clone https://github.com/vaga/hugo-theme-m10c.git 607 ls 608 cd .. 609 hugo server -t m10c --buildDrafts 610 hugo server -t hugo-theme-m10c --buildDrafts 611 hugo new post/hello.md 612 hugo server -t m10c --buildDrafts 613 hugo server -t m10c --buildDrafts 614 hugo server -t hugo-theme-m10c --buildDrafts 615 hugo --theme=hugo-theme-m10c --baseUrl="https://wantlogin.
